title: Star Trek - TOS - Subtitles - 15 languages - All seasons - Inclu
description:
This pack contains the subtitles for the "Star Trek - The original series"-torrents you can find here:
- http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4797761/Star_Trek_-_The_original_series_-_Season_1___extras_-_DVD-rip_xv
- http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4886394/Star_Trek_-_The_original_series_-_Season_2___extras_-_DVD-rip_xv
- http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/4896883/Star_Trek_-_The_original_series_-_Season_3___Extra_s_-_DVD-ri

The following languages are represented for the episodes:
- Czech
- Dansk
- Deutsch
- English
- English for the sonically challenged
- Espanol
- Francais
- Greek
- Italiano
- Magyar
- Nederlands
- Norsk
- Portugues
- Suomi
- Svenska
- Turkish

The commentaries are in the following languages:
- Deutsch
- English
- Espanol
- Francais
- Italiano

Besides from the subtitles there is also a "Red shirt logs" file that I apparently forgot to put in the season 2 torrent in the rar.

I hope I haven't made too many mistakes with the subtitles, but if you find any, please leave a comment on it below. I've put a lot of time and effort in making these files but considering there's over 1800 of them and I did them all myself there's bound to be some faulty ones.

Please help with the seeding after downloading at least for a while.

Enjoy your Star Trek!
